events.text: Welcome, DellBorg, I'm Atlas and I will guide you through this journey. First, let me put into context what is going on.
Basically you are our last hope to save Dell from the biggest financial crisis in history.
In 2050 (The year we are now, of course hehe) the world is collapsing, and the other companies are still using the project model.
But we know that this model is outdated and that's why many of them are at rock bottom.
That's why you will learn products model and save our company.
Try hard,  you are our last hope and we believe you!!!
Fine... To begin our journey,  enter in Dell building  [color=#FF0000] (you can do that by pressing space when you are in the front of the main door). [/color]Let's go!!!!
